newsitem.title: SWEDEN: FORECAST - Sandvik 9 mo profit 16 pct down.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Sandvik 9 mo profit 16 pct down.

text.p: Swedish tool maker and engineering group Sandvik was expected to post a lower profit after financial items of 3.60 billion crowns for the first nine months of 1996, a Reuter poll of 10 analysts found on Thursday.
Forecasts varied between 3.45 billion and 3.77 billion crowns.
In the same period a year ago Sandvik posted a profit of 4.31 billion crowns so the average forecast for the nine months to 1996 represented a fall of 16 percent.
For the full year 1996 the average of 10 analysts' forecast was for a profit of 4.87 billion crowns.
Analysts interviewed for the poll were from Handelsbanken, Swedbank, Foreningsbanken, Matteus, Deutsche Morgan Grenfell, Carnegie, Goldman Sachs, Kleinwort Benson, Merrill Lynch, Morgan Stanley.
Sandvik's nine month report is due to be released on November 12.
